basic.name: NPChan
basic.search_alt: Search for Threads, boards or archive...
basic.copyright_alt: All trademarks and copyrights on this page are owned by their respective parties. Images uploaded are the responsibility of the Poster. Comments are owned by the Poster.

home.site_intro:
NPChan is an anonymous discussion site where anyone can create new board, create new post or add new reply without revealing their identity. NPChan is Nepal's first and only of the kind. Here on NPChan, we have discussion about anything ranging from simple day-to-day life to Deepest and Darkest secrets of universe.

Joining NPChan is simple. Just pick any board below which you have interest on and start using NPChan. NPChan doesn't require registration to use any of the feature and will never ask for your personal identification. Learn how NPChan handles your Privacy.

Before proceeding, please take a look at our Rules. Note: Certain boards may contain adult contents, please be aware.

boards.board_name_alt: Board Name can be maximum 100 characters long and must be either in English or Nepali Language only.
boards.board_link_alt: Board Link will be URL for your board. Can contain AlphaNumeric (a-z and 0-9 only). This cannot be changed again. Eg: demolink will be used as npchan.com/demolink/
boards.board_type_alt: In which category the new board you are trying to create falls on.
boards.board_nsfw_alt: Do you allow sharing of adult images on your board?
boards.agree_terms: By creating new board (and using NPChan) you agree to accept our Rules.
boards.intro:
This page allows you to create a new board. Please enter the details correctly and choose the correct board type from dropdown box. Please try to use polite words on board name and link.

Your board will be activated and be available instantly, however, our moderators will check for the details you provided. You must read and accept our Rules before creating a board. NPChan reserves right to alter the information you provided, disable or remove any board NPChan if it is violation under NPChan rules.
boards.board_created:
Congratulations, Your board has been created successfully. Here are the few information about the board.

IMPORTANT: Please write the following information on paper, else you will not be able to manage this board again.

Here are your information:
boards.mod_login_alt: You can access this page directly using Manage my Board button on homepage.
boards.take_note: Please copy the following text into a secure location. This will be used to manage your board. If you lost it, you cannot reset it, neither can manage your board afterwards.
boards.board_created_extra: You can manage different settings for your board, upload an cover image, random images, edit board rules and many more from Board Management Panel.

threads.options_alt: You can leave this field empty if you want!
threads.text_alt: Type anything you want to express (optional if image is uploaded)

new_thread.captcha_error: You entered wrong captcha verification code. Please reverify the captcha code.
new_thread.empty_fields: You  haven't filled any fields. At least either text or image upload is required.
new_thread.empty_text_image: You haven't filled any fields. At least either text or image upload is required.
new_thread.no_nepali_ip: Looks like you are posting from Non-Nepalese IP Address. NPChan doesn't allows users to post from non-Nepalese IP Address. Learn More
new_thread.get_pro_account: To Post with foreign IP Address, Please consider purchasing NPChan Pro Gold Account.
new_thread.not_image: The file you uploaded is not an image. Please make sure you are uploading valid .jpeg, .jpg, .gif or .png image file.
new_thread.upload_error: Error Uploading. We couldn't verify your file and upload it. Please try again later. (Also make sure that file you are uploading is indeed an image.)
new_thread.board_locked: This board is locked. You cannot add new threads or post new replies.
new_thread.max_upload: You cannot upload image of size more than 8MB. Please select another image or use compression before posting to reduce image size.
new_thread.thread_locked: This thread is locked. You cannot add new replies.
new_thread.small_image: This image is too small for upload. Please upload larger image.
new_thread.large_image: This image is too large. Please resize it to small size (dimension) or upload another image.
new_thread.thread_not_found: The thread you are trying to reply/view couldn't be found. If it existed, it may have been archived or deleted.
new_thread.board_not_found: This board you are trying post or view thread of doesn't exits. It may have been deleted or renamed to another address.
new_thread.invalid_request: Invalid Request! We couldn't complete the request you/your browser sent to us. Please try again!
new_thread.flood_detected: Flood Detected! Please wait few seconds before creating new thread or adding new reply!
new_thread.something_went_wrong: Something went wrong! Please try again later!

new_board.invalid_request: Invalid Request! Please fill all the forms correctly.
new_board.invalid_link: The board link you submitted is invalid. Please use alphanumeric (a-z, 0-9) characters only.
new_board.link_taken: This board link is already taken. Please choose another link address for your board.
new_board.link_reserved: This board link is reserved by NPChan. Please contact NPChan administrator if you want to use this board link. (Note: Links resembling official Facebook Groups and News media of Nepal are reserved to avoid people creating fake boards. If you are administrator of such official group or company, please send us a mail at contact@npchan.com and we can provide you official verified board on NPChan.
new_board.link_long: Board Links must be between 3 to 10 characters long. Please use appropriate length of characters.
new_board.name_long: Board name must be between 3 to 100 characters long! Please try using appropriate length for board name.
new_board.unknown_error: Unknown Error! Please try again later.
new_board.invalid_type: The board type you selected isn't valid. Please hit the back button, refresh the page and submit the form again.

other.no_threads_found_alt: Null. Empty. Void. There is nothing to see here. Why not add a new thread and start a discussion?
other.no_reply_found: This thread doesn't have any replies. Why not add one? Click on the Quick Reply button or Reply to Thread button on top.
other.invalid_or_deleted_thread: This thread ID is either invalid or have been deleted!
